[Home](./index.md) &gt; [shieldbow](./shieldbow.md) &gt; [Client](./shieldbow.client.md)

## Client class

The shieldbow client that enables you to interact with Riot Games' League of Legends API. Also connects to the Data Dragon + Community Dragon CDNs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Client 
```

## Example

Here is how to use the client:

```ts
const myClient = new Client();
client.initialize({
  region: 'euw' // defaults to `na`.
}).then(() => {
  // All your code goes here.
});
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(apiKey)](./shieldbow.client._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Client</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [accounts](./shieldbow.client.accounts.md) |  | [AccountManager](./shieldbow.accountmanager.md) | The default riot accounts manager used by the client. This is mostly for internal usage. You may want to use [Client.summoners](./shieldbow.client.summoners.md) instead. |
|  [api](./shieldbow.client.api.md) |  | [ApiHandler](./shieldbow.apihandler.md) | The default API interactions handler used by the client. |
|  [cdnBase](./shieldbow.client.cdnbase.md) |  | string | The Data Dragon CDN Base URL |
|  [champions](./shieldbow.client.champions.md) |  | [ChampionManager](./shieldbow.championmanager.md) | The default champions manager used by the client. |
|  [clash](./shieldbow.client.clash.md) |  | [ClashManager](./shieldbow.clashmanager.md) | The default clash tournaments manager used by the client. |
|  [gameModes](./shieldbow.client.gamemodes.md) |  | [GameMode](./shieldbow.gamemode.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of all game modes and their respective data. |
|  [gameTypes](./shieldbow.client.gametypes.md) |  | [GameType](./shieldbow.gametype.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of all game types and their respective data. |
|  [http](./shieldbow.client.http.md) |  | AxiosInstance | The axios instance that handles all the CDN requests being made. |
|  [items](./shieldbow.client.items.md) |  | [ItemManager](./shieldbow.itemmanager.md) | The default items manager used by the client. |
|  [leagues](./shieldbow.client.leagues.md) |  | [LeagueManager](./shieldbow.leaguemanager.md) | The default summoner competitive league data manager used by the client.<!-- -->Highly recommended using [Client.summoners](./shieldbow.client.summoners.md) for a specific summoner's competitive info.<!-- -->Use this only if you want to query a list of users by rank-division. |
|  [locale](./shieldbow.client.locale.md) |  | [Locales](./shieldbow.locales.md) | The locale in which all the data is going to be fetched in. |
|  [maps](./shieldbow.client.maps.md) |  | [GameMap](./shieldbow.gamemap.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of all maps and their respective data. |
|  [matches](./shieldbow.client.matches.md) |  | [MatchManager](./shieldbow.matchmanager.md) | The default match manager used by the client. |
|  [patch](./shieldbow.client.patch.md) |  | string | The patch of the game currently in use.<!-- -->Must be above 5.1 for proper functionality. |
|  [queues](./shieldbow.client.queues.md) |  | [Queue](./shieldbow.queue.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of all queue types and their respective data. |
|  [region](./shieldbow.client.region.md) |  | [Region](./shieldbow.region.md) | The league of legends region from which the data is to be fetched. |
|  [runes](./shieldbow.client.runes.md) |  | [RuneTreeManager](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.md) | The default runes manager used by the client. |
|  [seasons](./shieldbow.client.seasons.md) |  | [Season](./shieldbow.season.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of all seasons and their respective IDs. |
|  [spectator](./shieldbow.client.spectator.md) |  | [CurrentGameManager](./shieldbow.currentgamemanager.md) | The default live match manager used by the client. |
|  [status](./shieldbow.client.status.md) |  | Promise&lt;unknown&gt; | Get the current status of the RIOT API.<!-- -->No type support for this (yet). |
|  [summoners](./shieldbow.client.summoners.md) |  | [SummonerManager](./shieldbow.summonermanager.md) | The default summoners manager used by the client. |
|  [summonerSpells](./shieldbow.client.summonerspells.md) |  | [SummonerSpellManager](./shieldbow.summonerspellmanager.md) | The default summoner spells manager used by the client. |
|  [version](./shieldbow.client.version.md) |  | string | The current Data Dragon CDN version. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [initialize(options)](./shieldbow.client.initialize.md) |  | Initialize the client to prepare it for interacting with the API. This can also be rerun if you want to configure anything and quickly fetch any required data. |
